foreignData.name: Priester des Spukdamms
foreignData.text: {T}, opfere den Priester des Spukdamms: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält bis zum Ende des Zuges -X/-X, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an verschneiten Ländern ist, die du kontrollierst. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur zu einem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du auch eine Hexerei wirken könntest.

foreignData.name: Sacerdote de la Linde Embrujada
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrificar el Sacerdote de la Linde Embrujada: La criatura objetivo obtiene -X/-X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la cantidad de tierras nevadas que controlas. Activa esta habilidad solo cuando puedas lanzar un conjuro.

foreignData.name: Prêtre de la frontière hantée
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifiez le Prêtre de la frontière hantée : Une créature ciblée gagne -X/-X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant le nombre de terrains neigeux que vous contrôlez. N'activez cette capacité que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.

foreignData.name: Sacerdote della Soglia Spettrale
foreignData.text: {T}, Sacrifica il Sacerdote della Soglia Spettrale: Una creatura bersaglio prende -X/-X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è il numero di terre neve che controlli. Attiva questa abilità solo quando potresti lanciare una stregoneria.

foreignData.name: 死霊堤の司祭
foreignData.text: {T}, 死霊堤の司祭を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－Ｘ/－Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはあなたがコントロールしている氷雪土地の数に等しい。この能力は、あなたがソーサリーを唱えられるときにのみ起動できる。
foreignData.type: 氷雪クリーチャー — ゾンビ・クレリック

foreignData.name: 귀신들린 벼랑의 사제
foreignData.text: {T}, 귀신들린 벼랑의 사제를 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -X/-X를 받는다. X는 당신이 조종하는 눈 대지의 수다. 당신이 집중마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기에만 이 능력을 활성화할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Sacerdote da Fronteira Assombrada
foreignData.text: {T}, sacrifique Sacerdote da Fronteira Assombrada: A criatura alvo recebe -X/-X até o final do turno, sendo X o número de terrenos da neve que você controla. Ative esta habilidade somente nos momentos em que poderia conjurar um feitiço.

foreignData.name: Жрец Предела Призраков
foreignData.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Жреца Предела Призраков: целевое существо получает -X/-X до конца хода, где Х — количество снежных земель под вашим контролем. Активируйте эту способность только при возможности разыгрывать волшебство.

foreignData.name: 祟锋僧侣
foreignData.text: {T}，牺牲祟锋僧侣：目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的雪境地数量。只可以于你能施放法术的时机下起动此异能。

foreignData.name: 祟鋒僧侶
foreignData.text: {T}，犧牲祟鋒僧侶：目標生物得-X/-X直到回合結束，X為由你操控的雪境地數量。只可以於你能施放巫術的時機下起動此異能。

name: Priest of the Haunted Edge
originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Priest of the Haunted Edge: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow lands you control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

rulings.text: Use the number of snow lands you control as the ability resolves to determine the value of X.
Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn’t a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can’t pay for {S} using mana that wasn’t produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don’t spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won’t do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn’t have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn’t apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.

text: {T}, Sacrifice Priest of the Haunted Edge: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of snow lands you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
